title: 【音乐mv】葬身火海
author: 黑哥DADA
txt_content:
本帖最后由 黑哥DADA 于 2015-11-1 15:12 编辑 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMTM3NTAxNDcwMA==/v.swf

检查翻译
歌词：
I really hate you
Stop getting in my way

I lost my patience
When are you gonna decay

I want to throw you out
Just like my broken TV

If you'll come back once more
It will be painful you'll see

Chorus:

I hope you die in a fire

Hope you'll be stabbed in the heart, hope you'll get shot and expire

Hope you'll be taken apart

Hope this is what you desire

Verse 2:

It's almost over
Why can't you just let it fly

Don't be afraid
It's not the first time you'll die

Your machical parts click
Sounds like when I broke your bones

Once I get my second chance,
I won't leave you alone

Chorus x2:

I hope you die in a fire

Hope you'll be stabbed in the heart, hope you'll get shot and expire

Hope you'll be taken apart

Hope this is what you desire
翻译有错与我联系


原作者：点击进入


我的频道：点击进入


如有版权问题请与我联系，我马上删除视频（mine, I just translate the movie, if you have any copyright issues, please notify me immediately, I will immediately remove movie）

replies.txt_content: 这种动画以画面为主，然而字幕太大了，碍眼，建议中英字幕双行并下排

replies.author: 黑哥DADA
Cheasd
replies.txt_content: 弹簧四件套获得方法：战胜四个玩具熊，逼出灵魂。让它们把你逼到未解封的弹簧套里，之后会死一次，然后就获得弹簧装了！8点防御力，附带力量效果，打玩具熊必备神装！

replies.author: Donnies_Ming
replies.txt_content:
Cheasd 发表于 2016-3-12 22:50
弹簧四件套获得方法：战胜四个玩具熊，逼出灵魂。让它们把你逼到未解封的弹簧套里，之后会死一次，然后就获 ...
没看片之前以为是某处引用来的广告
看完后发现这才是真相……

replies.author: Donnies_Ming
replies.txt_content:
重新顶上去
发现玩具熊来源玩具熊的五夜后宫
顺便安利另一个同人Halloween at Freddy's Song by TryHardNinja
